programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Child
programme.desc: In the hopes of giving her baby a better life, Akça, a hooker, is forced to give up her child, who is taken to be brought up by the wealthy Sule, but the situation changes after the latter has a baby of her own.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Secrets of an Angel
programme.desc: After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, Cennet phones Zeynep, a lawyer. After his death, he leaves a letter, which turns out to be a criminal complaint, upon which the lives of Cennet's children and Yilmaz will never be the same after that day.

programme.title: Hayet Khassa
programme.desc: The series sheds light on the daily life of Tunisian youth, through the depiction of the everyday lives of college students and the problems they encounter as they graduate and start working, with a focus on the struggles working women face to balance their jobs with their obligations at home.

programme.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: When he is hired to look into the murder of a drug kingpin's wife, former cop-turned-private investigator Matt Scudder uncovers a large number of connected murders that trace back to another drug dealer.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: McCall (Denzel Washington) is a former black ops commando who has faked his death to live a quiet life in Boston. When he comes out of his self-imposed retirement to rescue a young girl, Teri (Chloë Grace Moretz), he finds himself face to face with notorious Russian gangsters. As he serves vengeance against those who brutalize the helpless, McCall's desire for justice is reawakened.

programme.title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
programme.desc: When a murder takes place, two top paranormal investigators, Ed and Lorraine, scrumble to figure out the truth of a murderer claiming to be possessed by a demon.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: Fredrick and Eleanor Little go to an orphanage to adopt a child to be a brother for their son, George. There, they find a small white mouse called Stuart, and they decide to adopt him. Stuart has to deal with Snowbell, the family cat that wants to get rid of him.

programme.title: El Karazoun
programme.desc: A Syrian businessman, Adnan, travels to Beirut and gets exposed to an accident at the port explosion, so he decides to disappear in order to teach his spoiled daughter, Nour, how to be self-reliant and discover the truth around her. However, Karim and Rabee try to seize Nour's wealth.

programme.title: Ahl Al Madina
programme.desc: The series presents a vast panorama of social and economic life and the conflict between those who want to erase the memory of the country so that history begins with them, and those who want to emphasize the continuity of the cultural heritage of the country.

programme.title: Harem Al-Shawish
programme.desc: The series revolves around the love of money and power and how the simple and complicated social issues are resolved. It also discusses the things that disturb the lives of people who bring out evil and good in other people's lives.

programme.title: Baad Edet Sanawat
programme.desc: It discusses the change between the past and the present, as the events are set between the 1980s and the year 2014 through Abu Nawras, who lives in a working-class neighborhood and has many children.

programme.title: Forsa Akhera
programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

programme.title: Ahl Al Madina
programme.desc: The series presents a vast panorama of social and economic life and the conflict between those who want to erase the memory of the country so that history begins with them, and those who want to emphasize the continuity of the cultural heritage of the country.

programme.title: Bbsata 2
programme.desc: A collection of sketches discussing social and global issues like marriage, power, work, and future in a satirical way.

programme.desc: In the third season, Fares gets killed at the hands of Sayah, and Abu El Ezz thinks that Ghazi is the perpetrator so that he'd get the estate, upon which the conflict between them begins.

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. Khalil refuses to hand over the land to the heirs and clashes with Harbi's son, Mohamed, who loves Khalil's daughter.

programme.title: Al-Heiba Al-Awda
programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Hayya Al Rouh
programme.desc: The story follows an angelic girl named Haya, who, despite her disability, defies all circumstances and insists on confronting them, especially her uncle Mubarak, who left her in the care of her stepfather, Abdul Rahman.

programme.title: Bayn qalbayn
programme.desc: A romantic social drama that deals with the love story of the girl Ariam, who defended her love against the tough conditions she's living in at the time. She fell in love with Bashar despite being married to another.

programme.title: Nassibi w Esmetek 4
programme.desc: An anthology series of various tales from everyday life, including the story, "The White Eyeglasses", that follows Fakhr, who invents a pair of glasses that, when worn, can tell you how others truly feel about you underneath the lies and niceties.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae 'na lanast a hanner yng nghegin Cyw heddiw; mae gliter, glud a phaent ymhobman! There's a big mess in Cyw's kitchen today; there's glitter, glue and paint everywhere!

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Mae Og yn teimlo'n unig pan mae ei ffrindiau i gyd yn rhy brysur i chwarae ag e. Og feels lonely when all his friends are too busy to play with him.

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cêt ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Cêt on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Nos Da Cyw
programme.desc: Sh! Mae'r haul yn mynd i'w wely ac mae'n amser i ni gael stori fach cyn cysgu. Shh! The sun is going to bed so let's have a lovely little bedtime story.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae blawd yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd â hi i Fferm Fach i ddangos hud ffermio go iawn iddi. Nel wants to know where Flour comes from.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod sioe Arddangos Llysiau Gorau Pontypandy. Mae'r plant wedi tyfu pwmpen enfawr ond mae Jams a hi yn cael antur a hanner! It's the day of Pontypandy's Best Vegetable Show!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pwy oedd y person cyntaf ar y lleuad? Cyfle euraidd i Tad-cu ddweud wrtho mai ei fam-gu a'i ffrind Beti oedd y bobl yna! Hari's question today is: who was the first person on the moon?

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon y cnofilod a'r malwod fydd yn cael y sylw. In this programme we get to know about rodents and snails.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with more funny and silly sketches to make you laugh!

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Gwil yn darganfod map trysor ond mae Maer Campus yn cipio'r map ac yn rhedeg i ffwrdd. Mayor Campus snatches a treasure map and runs off to find the loot for himself.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Newyddion i blant hyd at 6 oed fydd yn diddannu ac yn eu dysgu am y byd o'u cwmpas, yn ei holl amrywiaeth. News for children up to 6 years old, to entertain and educate them about the world.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Nimbwl yn rhy bryderus i fynd am ei fathodyn Clwb Cymylau cyntaf. Mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio ei helpu gyda'i nerfusrwydd. Nimbwl is too nervous to do his first Cloud Club badge.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn cyfeiriannu ym Mharc Craig y Nos, ac fe fydd Alys a'i ffrind Mila yn gwersylla. Today, Huw and Elan will be surfing in Caswell Bay.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw.

programme.title: Cynefin
programme.desc: Hanes, bywyd gwyllt, a diwydiant a diwylliant y Fenai sy'n mynd â sylw Heledd, Iestyn a Sion y tro hwn. This time, we discover the history, wildlife, industry & culture of the Menai Straits.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Mae'r ci defaid Fergie, a enwyd ar ol Syr Alex Ferguson, wedi cael anaf i'w goes. Bess and Gel the corgis need pampering ahead of a dog show, and a cat is left on the practice doorstep.

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Yn y bennod hon, fydd mam o Gaerdydd yn derbyn gosodiad blodau anhygoel er cof am ei merch. In this episode, a mum from Cardiff receives a striking flower display in memory of her daughter.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol Y Grawys - Season 1, Episode 1
Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Mae Nia yng Nghaerfyrddin i gwrdd â theuluoedd sy'n helpu'r banc bwyd yn ystod Grawys. Gyda chanu o Gapel Gellimanwydd, Rhydaman. We meet Carmarthen families helping a food bank during Lent.

programme.title: Dan Do
programme.desc: Ymweliad â hen fwthyn ceidwad wedi ei drawsnewid yn dy modern, efo golygfeydd o'r de ddwyrain. We step back to the 60's and 70's near Llanelli and visit a cottage from Owain Glyndwr's era.

programme.title: Tir Cymru
programme.desc: Yn y gyfres drawiadol hon, bydd Iolo Williams yn archwilio tirweddau Cymru a'r bywyd gwyllt sydd yn byw arnyn nhw. Iolo Williams explores the different landscapes of Wales.

programme.title: Ffilmiau Ddoe Emma Walford - Season 1, Episode 1
Ffilmiau Ddoe
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Ym mhennod un, Emma Walford sy'n gwylio rhai o ffilmiau Yr Archif Genedlaethol, a Caryl Parry Jones sy'n dysgu mwy am Y Rhyl ar y sgrin. New series about Wales on reel.

programme.title: Ty am Ddim Pennant - Season 3, Episode 6
Ty Am Ddim
programme.desc: Tro ma, bwthyn bach Cymraeg traddodiadol ym Mhennant sy'n cael ei adnewyddu gan ddau hogyn lleol. This time, an electrician and a carpenter renovate a traditional Welsh cottage in Pennant.

programme.title: Ar Werth
programme.desc: Cawn weld sut mae hen blasdy ar lan y Fenai wedi cael ei droi'n fflatiau moethus. New series featuring estate agents selling homes in Wales including one on sale for nearly a million pounds!

programme.title: Drych Dyfodol i Dewi - Season 1, Episode 1
DRYCH: Dyfodol i Dewi
programme.desc: Dilynwn frwydr foesol Eleri Morgan i ddod â babi i fyd sydd â dyfodol hinsawdd ansicr. We follow comedian Eleri Morgan's struggle to reconcile having a baby with leading a low-carbon life.

programme.title: Siân Phillips yn 90
programme.desc: Ffilm ddogfen yn edrych nôl ar fywyd a gyrfa Siân Phillips, un o'n actoresau mwyaf eiconig, wrth iddi droi'n 90. Documentary looking at the life and career of Siân Phillips as she turns 90.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad Bethan Moch Coch - Season 2024, Episode 1
Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Ymweliad â Bethan Morgan, a ddychwelodd i'w bro genedigol a phrynu fferm Penrallt, Talog, er mwyn magu moch a gwybod o le mae ei chig yn dod. We visit a successful Tamworth pig business.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn ôl dros ddigwyddiadau'r wythnos yng Nghwmderi. Omnibus edition looking back at events in the fictional village of Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Bydd Lowri Morgan ym Merthyr Tudful i ddathlu bywyd a gwaith y cyfansoddwr Joseph Parry. We celebrate the composer Joseph Parry, and enjoy a feast of hymns from Canolfan Soar in the town.

programme.title: New: Am Dro
programme.desc: Laura, Matthew, Bethan a Gwilym sy'n ein tywys i fyny Mynydd y Gwrhyd, Cwm Tawe; Mynydd Parys, Amlwch; Nebo; a Phenrhyncoch. We visit Cwmtawe, Amwlch, Nebo and the Aberystwyth area.

programme.title: Gogglebocs Cymru
programme.desc: Mae Gogglebocs Cymru 'nôl. Ymunwch â Tudur Owen a'i ffrindiau - hen a newydd - i sbio ar deledu'r wythnos o Gymru a thu hwnt. Gogglebocs Cymru is back, with laughter, tears and arguments.

programme.title: Paid a Dweud Hoyw

programme.desc: Mae Betsan yn froga anarferol iawn - nid yw'n gallu nofio. Tybed sut ddysgith hi? Betsan is a very unusual frog - she can't swim. So how is she ever going to learn?

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Enfys wedi llwyddo i glymu ei hun yn gwlwm ac felly mae'n rhaid i'r Cymylaubychain ei helpu gyda'r gwaith. Rainbow is in a knot and needs some help.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Ar ôl chwarae'n y glaw, mae Pablo'n hapus, ond eto'n drist wrth orffen. Mae'n sylweddoli y gall deimlo mwy nag un peth ar unwaith. Pablo experiences different feelings playing in the rain.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae blawd yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd â hi i Fferm Fach i ddangos hud ffermio go iawn iddi. Nel wants to know where Flour comes from.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw rydyn ni'n ymweld â gwlad Denmarc er mwyn dysgu am y brifddinas Copenhagen, yr awdur enwog Hans Christian Andersen, a bwyd enwog fel crwst Danaidd. Today, we visit Denmark.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos the train and friends.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Mai-Mai yn colli llyfr lluniau arbennig Mabli ond all hi ddefnyddio camera Pip i ailosod y lluniau coll? On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are spring cleaning!

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd morladron Ysgol Pont Sion Norton yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys nôl? Can the pirates from Ysgol Pont Sion Norton help Ben Dant and Cadi?

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Wil ac Aeron Gwrachod - Season 1, Episode 1
Wil ac Aeron: Taith Rwmania
programme.desc: Taith newydd yn y camperfan dros 4000 o filltiroedd i bwynt pellaf a mwya' dwyreiniol Ewrop, Rwmania. The two farmers set off in their campervan on a new adventure - a trip to Romania. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhodri sydd mewn dangosiad o 'The Way' gyda Michael Sheen, a dathlwn penblwydd Syr Karl Jenkins. We're at a screening of The Way with Michael Sheen, and celebrate Sir Karl Jenkins' birthday.

programme.title: Caeau Cymru Ysbyty Ifan, Conwy - Season 1, Episode 5
Caeau Cymru: Ysbyty Ifan, Conwy
programme.desc: Fferm Gwern Hywel Uchaf, ger Ysbyty Ifan yng Nghonwy, fydd canolbwynt y rhaglen heddiw. Brychan Llyr asks what Abraham Lincoln has to do with a field on a farm in Ysbyty Ifan, Conwy.

programme.title: Dan Do
programme.desc: Y tro hwn: ymweliad â thy hynafol yng Nghonwy sy'n llawn nodweddion annisgwyl. We visit a grand Edwardian home in the capital and an old miners cottage in the heart of Cwmtawe.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: New: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Stryd i'r Sgrym
programme.desc: Wrth i'r sgiliau rygbi ddatblygu cawn gyfle i sefydlu anghenion aelodau'r tîm i ffwrdd o'r cae gyda thrafodaeth am iechyd meddwl. What makes a good rugby team? Physical or mental strength?

programme.title: Bwyd Epic Chris Cebab Budur Figan - Season 1, Episode 1
Bwyd Chris Byr
programme.desc: Risét o drydedd cyfres Bwyd Epic Chris - Cebab Budr Figan. A recipe from the third series of Bwyd Epic Chris - Vegan Kebabs.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Mae Og a'i ffrindiau'n teimlo'n gyffrous iawn wrth ddisgwyl i lindysen droi'n bili pala. Og and his friends feel very excited waiting for a caterpillar to turn into a butterfly.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw ni'n teithio i wlad sy'n grefyddol ac yn gartref i fynydd talaf y byd, sef Nepal. Today we go to the top of Mount Everest with the help of the people who live there - the Sherpas.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n cael cystadleuaeth cerdded mynydd. On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are having a mountain hiking competition!

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn: teuluoedd sy'n byw yn y goedwig sy'n cael y sylw a down i nabod teulu'r lemwr a theulu'r dylluan. This time, we meet two families who live in the woods - the lemur and the owl.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Mae Ysgol Gymraeg Y Trallwng yn hen a llawn a phawb eisiau ysgol newydd; heddiw cawn glywed beth yw eu cynlluniau i newid hyn. We hear if Ysgol Gymraeg Y Trallwng are getting a new school.

programme.title: Siwrne Ni
programme.desc: Y tro 'ma, mae Seren yn disgwyl 'mlaen i fynd i siopa am ddeunydd holl bwysig cyn iddi ddechrau yn yr ysgol Uwchradd. Self confessed shopaholic, Seren, can't wait to go school shopping!

programme.title: Byd Rwtsh Dai Potsh
programme.desc: Mae Dai wrth ei fodd ei fod o a'i deulu'n mynd ar wyliau ac yn hedfan am y tro cyntaf erioed. Dave's first ever plane journey doesn't quite go to plan and his head swells.

programme.title: LEGO ® Ffrindiau: Amdani Ferched!
programme.desc: Gadawa Andrea'r tîm rasio, ond daw'n ol pan mae Mia'n mynd i drwbwl mawr. The ugly truth makes Andrea quit the Race-team, but when Mia gets in trouble all her friends are back to help.

programme.title: Itopia
programme.desc: Drama sci-fi yn llawn dirgelwch. Sci-fi drama full of mystery.

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programme for youngsters.

programme.title: Cegin Bryn Cyw Iâr - Season 3, Episode 6
Cegin Bryn
programme.desc: Yn rhaglen olaf y gyfres bydd y cogydd Bryn Williams yn dangos sut i goginio gyda chyw iâr. In the final programme of the series, Bryn Williams will be showing us how to cook with chicken.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Does gan Gwenno ddim syniad sut i ddweud wrth Iestyn ac Anest ei bod yn bwriadu prynu ty efo Vince. Dylan, Mel and Cai witness Sophie's increasingly bad mood - but what is causing it?

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Y Byd ar Bedwar
programme.desc: Gyda'r galw am frechiadau colli pwysau yn tyfu a'r stoc yn isel mae'n camerau cudd ni'n datgelu busnesau yng Nghymru sy'n gwerthu cynnyrch heb drwyddedu. A look at weight loss vaccinations.

programme.title: New: Y Fets
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod prysur i'r unig ddwy Glesni sy'n fets cofrestredig yn y DU - a'r ddwy yn gweithio yn Ystwyth Fets. Sheepdog Fan is rushed to the practice and Nessy the snake slithers in!

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrdd a'r artist o Ben Llyn Wini Jones Lewis sy'n teithio cefn gwlad yn dehongli a chofnodi'r tirluniau sy'n dal ei llygaid. We meet local Pen Llyn artist Wini, who paints the countryside.

programme.title: New: Ralio+: Sweden
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau ail rownd Pencampwriaeth Rali'r Byd o Sweden. All Elfyn Evans ennill eto ar un o ralïau mwyaf heriol y calendr? Highlights from the Swedish World Rally Championship - Round 2.

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pêl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Weekend game highlights, including Briton Ferry Llansawel v The New Saints, Bala Town v Flint Mountain and Buckley Town v Connah's Quay.

programme.title: New: Clwb Rygbi: Gweilch v Ulster
programme.desc: Cyfle arall i weld gêm Pencampwriaeth Rygbi Unedig y Gweilch v Ulster a chwaraewyd ddoe. Another opportunity to see the URC Ospreys v Ulster game played yesterday at the Swansea.com stadium.
